summary: This is a batch file for the Alchemy Loop glitch.
descriptionHtml:
This is a batch file for the Alchemy Loop glitch. Just download it and move it to your Skyrim main folder. (NOT THE DATA FILE!) After you move it, just type in "bat alchemyloop" without the quotes and you will receive all the item nessesary for the glitch along with every enchantment. You will need to disenchant all of the items to get the enchantment.
<br /><br />
<br /><br /> ****IMPORTANT**** IN ORDER TO USE THIS GLITCH, YOU CAN'T BE USING THE UNOFFICIAL PATCHES. IF YOU DO, THIS GLITCH WILL BE UNUSABLE
<br /><br />
<br /><br />On another note, be careful when you are doing this glitch. If you exceed like 2mil you will break your game so save often.
author: Okanomi
